body.p: Consequently, the FASB decided to amend Topic 360 and create Subtopic 610‑20 Gains and Losses from the Derecognition of Nonfinancial Assets to require that an entity apply the requirements in Topic 606 for the existence of a contract, for control, and for measurement of a contract for the transfer of real estate (including in-substance real estate) that is not an output of the entity’s ordinary activities. If the real estate is a business (and not an in-substance non‑financial asset), the requirements in Subtopic 810‑10 for consolidation apply.
